Key Arguments: The democratic system should protect freedom of speech.
Censorship is alarming and detrimental to scientific debate and progress.
Humans are fallible, and a single narrative should not be enforced.
Censorship is about power and control, not protection.
Notable Quotes: Science cannot flourish without debate, and it is unscientific to not have discussion or debate.
Censorship goes hand-in-hand with authoritarian rule, so I strongly do Not support this.
